ai-ne24:1.1_0: Herein, what is the characteristic of breathing?
ai-ne24:2.1_0: “Right thought, the mind should be rightly understood as right thought.”
ai-ne24:2.2_0: “There are these five faculties: Right thought and mind, their sense faculty is substantive, and their sense faculties are calmed.
ai-ne24:2.3_0: “The right view is aim of right view, right thought, right speech, right action.”
ai-ne24:2.5_0: For right view gives rise to right thought. Right thought gives rise to right speech. Right speech gives rise to right action. Right action gives rise to right livelihood. Right livelihood gives rise to right effort. Right effort gives rise to right mindfulness. Right mindfulness gives rise to right immersion. Right immersion gives rise to right knowledge and vision. Right knowledge gives rise to right freedom.
ai-ne24:2.6_0: Free of whatever marks has the characteristic of stiffenedness,
